name: Get Them Out! (DerpiezGames)
description:
General:

My first ever finished game also my first ever GameJam I participated. Also I have zero experience in gamedevelopment, so I love some feedback to improve. 

Discord: Just_Bram#9218
Created for BenBonk Game Jam #4 Story: There are 3 communities in the world: the healthies, fasties and buffies. They don't like eachother so you have to keep them apart or they will make a mess and the balance of the world will be destroyed!
P.S. First 60points are free after that you can lose the game if you don't play smart. Controls:
  • Dragging: mouse button
